title: Ja Youn E
description: All-you-can-eat buffet that uses many organic products. Features natural seasonings and no artificial additives. Purple bamboo salt, fermented bean and chilly paste, soy sauce, and kimchi are used instead of sea salt or refined table salt. Directions: From Jeon Ju IC, take Seobu Detour Road toward World Cup Stadium, turn left and go past North Police Station, turn right at Hyundai Apt. intersection to Seo Shin Dong Office, the restaurant is behind Ji Ri San building. Map marker is not correct, please send HappyCow correct coordinates.
streetAddress: Wan San Gu, Seo Shin Dong 806
